name: Jetris (FruitRed)
description:
MY FIRST PROPER VIDEO GAME

I made this during my senior year of high school. My first true video game all coded with Java.

Play Tetris like never before in Jetris! Select from up to 3 pieces of classical music to enjoy as you frantically interlock blocks and clear lines! Choose what speed to start on, or for an extra challenge, choose how many unfilled lines you want to start the game with.

INSTALL
1. Download ZIP
2. Extract ZIP
3. Run the JetrisRun.bat file

CONTROLS

A - Rotate Piece Counterclockwise
D - Rotate Piece Clockwise
Left Arrow - Move Piece Left
Right Arrow - Move Piece Right
S - Hard Drop
Down Arrow - Soft Drop
Space Bar - Hold Piece
Escape - Close Game

Use the arrow keys and enter key to navigate through the menus.
